title: Cant connect to games?
body: When ever I try to play a game I go through champ select and then when it comes to loading in the game I cant connect. Someone please help me. I've repaired my client and restarted my computer twice.

replies.body:
There's currently a bug preventing players from auto-connecting to games. You should receive an error message when this happens; simply click "Cancel" then "Reconnect" and you should be in-game!!

Let me know if you have any further questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GjEw4Fiy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-17T03:02:36.773+0000)
>
> There's currently a bug preventing players from auto-connecting to games. You should receive an error message when this happens; simply click "Cancel" then "Reconnect" and you should be in-game!!
> 
> Let me know if you have any further questions.

The error isnt popping up.

Could be a connection issue on your end. [Troubleshoot it.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj

Your connection might be having some trouble reaching the game server.  Try out the instructions found in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Let me know if you have any questions about it.
